name: @genesysgo/shadow-nft-generated-client
description: Generated client for minter and nft standard programs for Shadow NFTs

scripts.postpublish: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.postversion: git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: update $npm_package_name to v$npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_name@$npm_package_version
